001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core.Projectile;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Ticks;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.Task;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
009import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.PaperUtils;
010import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.effect.PaperEffectors;
011import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.plugin.BasePlugin;
012import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
013import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.scheduler.PaperScheduler;
014import com.github.aecsocket.sokol.paper.PaperBlueprint;
015import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
016import org.bukkit.Location;
017import org.bukkit.Particle;
018import org.bukkit.World;
019import org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity;
020import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
021import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
022import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
023import org.bukkit.event.block.Action;
024import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent;
025import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
026
027import java.text.DecimalFormat;
028import java.text.DecimalFormatSymbols;
029import java.util.HashMap;
030import java.util.Locale;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.function.Predicate;
033
034public final class CalibrePlugin extends BasePlugin<CalibrePlugin> {
035    private static final Map<Locale, DecimalFormat> DECIMAL_FORMATS = new HashMap<>();
036
037    private final PaperScheduler scheduler = new PaperScheduler(this);
038    private final PaperEffectors effectors = new PaperEffectors(this);
039    private final Map<Player, PlayerData> playerData = new HashMap<>();
040    private final Explosions explosions = new Explosions(this);
041    private final Penetration penetration = new Penetration(this);
042    private PaperRaycast.Builder raycastBuilder;
043
044    public PaperScheduler scheduler() { return scheduler; }
045    public PaperEffectors effectors() { return effectors; }
046    public Explosions explosions() { return explosions; }
047    public Penetration penetration() { return penetration; }
048    public PaperRaycast.Builder raycastBuilder() { return raycastBuilder; }
049
050    public PlayerData playerData(Player player) {
051        return playerData.computeIfAbsent(player, k -> new PlayerData(this, k));
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public void onEnable() {
056        super.onEnable();
057
058        scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
059            var iter = playerData.entrySet().iterator();
060            while (iter.hasNext()) {
061                var entry = iter.next();
062                if (entry.getKey().isValid()) {
063                    ctx.run(Task.single(entry.getValue()::tick));
064                } else
065                    iter.remove();
066            }
067        }, Ticks.MSPT));
068
069        Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new Listener() {
070            /*
071                5.56x45mm Bullet:
072                  v = 900m/s
073                  m = 4g = 0.004kg
074                  diameter = 5.70mm = 0.0057m
075                  radius = 0.00285m
076                  cross section = πr^2 = 2.5517586328783095e-05
077                    = 0.000025517m^2
078                  ρ = 1.225kg/m^3
079
080                  Cd = 0.06 (https://sites.google.com/site/technicalarchery/technical-discussions-1/drag-coefficients-of-bullets-arrows-and-spears)
081
082                  F = ((1.225 x Cd x 2.552e-05) / 2) * 900^2
083                   -> 0.30386664
084
085                  a = F / m = 0.30386664 / 0.004
086                   -> 75.96666m/s^2
087                   -> 3.798m/t^2
088                 */
089
090            @EventHandler
091            void onEvent(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
092                if (event.getAction() == Action.LEFT_CLICK_AIR) {
093                    Player player = event.getPlayer();
094                    World world = player.getWorld();
095                    Location eye = player.getEyeLocation();
096                    Projectile<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> projectile = new Projectile<>(
097                        raycastBuilder.build(world), PaperUtils.toCommons(eye), PaperUtils.toCommons(eye.getDirection().multiply(100)),
098                        Projectile.GRAVITY, 0.06, 2.552e-05, 0.004
099                    ) {
100                        @Override
101                        protected double mediumDensity(Vector3 pos) {
102                            return pos.y() > 90 ? 100000000d : 1.225;
103                        }
104
105                        @Override
106                        protected Predicate<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> test() {
107                            return b -> b.entity() == null || b.entity() != player;
108                        }
109
110                        @Override
111                        protected void step(TaskContext ctx, Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Vector3 origin, Vector3 direction) {
112                            player.spawnParticle(Particle.END_ROD, PaperUtils.toPaper(position, world), 0);
113                        }
114                    };
115                    scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> ctx.run(Task.single(projectile::tick)), Ticks.MSPT));
116                } else {
117                    scheduler.cancel();
118                }
119            }
120        }, this);
121    }
122
123    public void damage(LivingEntity entity, double damage, @Nullable LivingEntity source) {
124        if (entity == source)
125            entity.damage(damage);
126        else
127            entity.damage(damage, source);
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    public void load() {
132        super.load();
133        explosions.load();
134        penetration.load();
135        raycastBuilder = PaperRaycast.builder(); // TODO raycast options
136        for (var data : playerData.values()) {
137            data.load();
138        }
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    protected CalibreCommand createCommand() throws Exception {
143        return new CalibreCommand(this);
144    }
145
146    public static String format2(Locale locale, double value) {
147        DecimalFormat format = DECIMAL_FORMATS.computeIfAbsent(locale, k -> new DecimalFormat("0.##", DecimalFormatSymbols.getInstance(k)));
148        return format.format(value);
149    }
150
151    public static String format2Raw(Locale locale, double value) {
152        return String.format(locale, "%.2f", value);
153    }
154}
